## R Markdown

```{eviews mychunk,prompt=T,eval=TRUE,fig.cap="somefigure",fig.subcap=c("A figure","Another figure")}
#| fig.show: hold
#| echo: TRUE
#| fig.keep: new
#| graph_procs: ["axis(b) font(40,b)","template modern","template default"]

'wfcreate(wf=sagiru,page=mati) m 2000 2025
open mychunk
delete gra*
genr y=@cumsum(nrnd)
genr x=@cumsum(nrnd)
genr z=@cumsum(nrnd)
                     graph grap1.line z  
                           graph grap2.line y
   freeze(grap,mode=overwrite) x.line
equation ols.ls y c x

wfsave mychunk
```

x=cumsum(rnorm(100))

plot(x,y)
